page.title: 08ULLAPOOL FAMILIES.
page.content: ALEXANDRA - My Mam makes a roast for Sunday dinner. ALASDAIR - On Saturday I help Dad collect the eggs and feed the cows. KAREN - Half-way through the Sunday Church Service the children go out to Sunday School. STEVEN - After tea,we go out on our bicycles,play football or watch TV. JOAN MARY - When we went for a picnic we took Bag-puss,our cat. JOHN - I read my Dandy book and comics and then I go to sleep. DEIDRE - My Dad builds roads and only gets home at weekends. DONALD - Every Saturday I have to set the fire and light it. ROSS - On Saturdays,if the fish are jumping,I go fishing. JOANNE -My Mum goes away as Nurse with the ambulance to Raigmore Hospital. SCOTT-On sunny days I go to the beach.
